description: If true, the service is an add only, not an update.

EarningObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

EarningObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

EarningObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: ID of the External Payroll Earning. Specify either the WID or "Earning_Code=12345".

External_Payroll_Earning_Extended_Data.description: Name of the External Payroll Earning.
Code of the External Payroll Earning, which is also used as the unique identifier for the External Payroll Earning for the reference ID type Earning_Code.
A non unique external payroll code. You can only specify this field if the Enable External Payroll Code check box is selected on the Edit Tenant Setup - HCM task.
If true, the External Payroll Earning is position-based.

Pay_Component_GroupObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

External_Payroll_Earning_Extended_Data.description: Specify the Pay Component Group on all related pay components, such as earnings and deductions, when reporting on external payroll results from the External Payroll Results Inbound template. ID of the Pay Component Group. Specify either the WID or "Pay_Component_Group_Code=12345".

Comments regarding the External Payroll Earning.

description: Contains the External Payroll Earning data.

validation.validation: Payroll Input Type: Goal Amount can not be selected on its own.  Must contain at least Input and/or Adjustment.
validation.description: Payroll Input Type: Goal Amount can not be selected on its own.  Must contain at least Input and/or Adjustment.

validation.validation: Calculations should be of type Absence  Component Related Calculation of type Time Off Paid or Time Off Unpaid
validation.description: Calculations should be of type Absence  Component Related Calculation of type Time Off Paid or Time Off Unpaid

validation.validation: Pay Groups must be active and  used in Payroll Interface
validation.description: Pay Groups must be active and  used in Payroll Interface

validation.validation: Pay Component Group should be of type Payroll Interface
validation.description: Pay Component Group should be of type Payroll Interface

validation.validation: Pay Component Group should be of type Inbound Payroll Interface
validation.description: Pay Component Group should be of type Inbound Payroll Interface

validation.validation: If Earning is associated with a Compensation Element, it cannot be associated with a Tag.
validation.description: If Earning is associated with a Compensation Element, it cannot be associated with a Tag.

validation.validation: If Earning is associated with a Time Off, it cannot be associated with a Tag
validation.description: If Earning is associated with a Time Off, it cannot be associated with a Tag

validation.validation: If Earning is associated with a Compensation Element, it cannot also be associated with either a Time Off, Benefit Plan or Benefit Coverage Group.
validation.description: If Earning is associated with a Compensation Element, it cannot also be associated with either a Time Off, Benefit Plan or Benefit Coverage Group.

validation.validation: If Earning is associated with a Time Off, it cannot also be associated with either a Compensation Element, Benefit Plan or Benefit Coverage Group.
validation.description: If Earning is associated with a Time Off, it cannot also be associated with either a Compensation Element, Benefit Plan or Benefit Coverage Group.

validation.validation: The external earning cannot be position based because it is used for benefits plans.  External earnings tagged with Flex Credits (2010$45), Taxable Benefit (2010$43), Taxable Benefit - Imputed Income for GTL (2010$44), or Fair Market Value (2010$84) are used for benefits plans.
validation.description: The external earning cannot be position based because it is used for benefits plans.  External earnings tagged with Flex Credits (2010$45), Taxable Benefit (2010$43), Taxable Benefit - Imputed Income for GTL (2010$44), or Fair Market Value (2010$84) are used for benefits plans.

validation.validation: The external earning cannot be position based because multiple jobs are not enabled in this tenant.
validation.description: The external earning cannot be position based because multiple jobs are not enabled in this tenant.

validation.validation: The Code entered is already in use on another Earning.
Payroll Input Type: Ongoing and Adjustment cannot be selected at the same time.
validation.description: Payroll Input Type: Ongoing and Adjustment cannot be selected at the same time.
